alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 10:46PM CDT until March 26 at 8:36AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay River At Enterprise. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 27.5 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Chickasawhay River Enterprise 25.0 18.6 Tue 10 pm CD 27.2 27.1 21.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 9 AM CDT.
